name: Infinitebound: Sashley fangame
description:
I'm developing a game for Sashley, inspired by Toby Fox's games.  It's my first project on C# and Unity. You will play as Ashely, test subject of a company called Infinite. You have to escape the laboratory full of mutants, psychos and other monsters that you will have to defeat. To kill or to spare them is up to you. 
https://discord.gg/YzwfbefvTp - discord server
Raw prototype version available
WASD - movement
Hold Shift - run
Hold Alt - slow movement
E, space - Interact, use, shot, attack
Z - skip dialogue
X - skip typing
C - cancel inbattle action
U - skill tree
I - Inventory
Tab - quests
~ - console (but you don't know any cheat commands(((( )
